I’ve been away from this project for over a month now. I ended up taking a little bit of a hiatus since my last post as the world got a bit crazy since then1 but here we are, learning how to get to the other side of this together — and from a distance.

This past month I've been avoiding getting into code after work (from home) so I spend some good part of my day away from the screen. I think I'm getting the hang of it now and am much more comfortable to slowly get back to this project.

I wanted to talk about layout blocks (yeah, components) and how I'm setting their chunks of code and layout so this is going to be a more visual post.
